If you're interested in a family-friendly film with a magical twist, "The BFG" is another great choice. It tells the story of Sophie, a young girl who encounters a friendly giant named BFG and goes on an exciting adventure together. The movie features stars like Roald Dahl himself, Bill Cotton Jr., and Angela Lansbury!
